body:
**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/7.8.0/rules_java-7.8.0.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "647bb31c0d51882549def6f67ee9078df697043406ed4a5144bbdf3b17f91e33",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/7.8.0).

# BAD RELEASE, DO NOT USE

**Change Log**
 - Remove dependence on Bazel internal naming scheme for canonical repos in `local_java_repository`: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/000587f210b73e45e646a9e459166fc56853ff6a

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/7.7.1/rules_java-7.7.1.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "28d4c2ea9e7dac41f1e13e3014f335dbc4f339e66c78b18b2cc09d652a0265e1",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/7.7.1).

**WORKSPACE setup**

```

    sha256 = "790d1ab5c75a6236b2ceaef01f50687a9d18a219aaff70865cb20326cb50bbc2",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/7.7.0).

## BAD RELEASE
### This version is broken for WORKSPACE users that invoke `rules_java_toolchains()`, use 7.6.3 instead.

**New Features**
n/a

**Incompatible Changes**
n/a

**Change Log**
- Updated zulu jdk versions to 8.78.0.19-ca-jdk8.0.412, 11.72.19-ca-jdk11.0.23, 17.50.19-ca-jdk17.0.11, 21.34.19-ca-jdk21.0.3

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/7.6.2/rules_java-7.6.2.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "eb43f35e3498e6bb8253e2c1759f9a48e56a104e462a58f4163d8f900e7ee8d0",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/7.6.2).

 - Added `java_utils.bzl` with a utility method for tokenizing javacopts

**New Features**
- Fixes incorrect reference to "//toolchains:platformclasspath"
- Updates guidance for registering toolchains declared by `local_java_repository`


**Change Log**
 - local_java_repository accepts arbitrary kwargs: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/ac71e40a2bd9dc681dcf60ff3e69463d71f0c3a9
 - expose toolchain bzl sources for stardoc: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/ecf792b435c6aa639182aaeeb194b7b6f3d842f3
- add bzlmod dep on rules_license: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/commit/819a33d05d64dd15f10359d27a8e43337638fef0

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/6.1.0/rules_java-6.1.0.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "78e3c24f05cffed529bfcafd1f7a8d1a7b97b4a411f25d8d3b4d47d9bb980394",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/6.1.0).
